programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: Harry Potter returns to Hogwarts for his second year but dreadful things begin to happen at the school. Harry, Hermione and Ron do everything wizardly possible to solve this deadly mystery.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation of a young woman's death reveals that she and other women were recently accused of a raping a male stripper.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A boy, 6, is shot and then abandoned in an emergency room by his fearful mother, sending detectives in search of his missing family and the gunman.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Fin are forced to team up to investigate a rape-murder case in which a police officer (guest star Michael O'Keefe) might be the prime suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Stabler races against time to determine if a convicted man on death row also murdered and raped another victim.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
programme.desc: On his 11th birthday Harry Potter learns he is the orphaned son of two wizards and is invited to attend Hogwarts School of Witchcraft & Wizardry where he embarks on the adventure of a lifetime.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: Harry Potter returns to Hogwarts for his second year but dreadful things begin to happen at the school. Harry, Hermione and Ron do everything wizardly possible to solve this deadly mystery.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione return for a third term at Hogwarts. But Harry's fate, and that of the entire community of wizards, looks bleak when the infamous Sirius Black escapes from prison.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: During Harry's fourth year at Hogwarts a competition will be held between three schools of wizardry, and contestants will be magically chosen for the very dangerous event.

programme.title: Live: WWE Friday Night SmackDown
programme.desc: The Superstars of World Wrestling Entertainment display their skills and athleticism in weekly episodic programming, as scores are settled and enduring rivalries play out in the ring.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry struggles to find balance with his new human form.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry struggles to find balance with his new human form.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry and Heather reunite, but their relationship is more complicated than ever.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry struggles to find balance with his new human form.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore must assist Newt Scamander and his partners as Grindelwald begins to lead an army to eliminate all Muggles.

programme.desc: Highlights from day four of the 2025 Henley Royal Regatta, including the Queen Mother Challenge Cup, Diamond Challenge Sculls and Princess Royal Challenge Cup.

programme.title: Born Racers
programme.desc: At the Spanish Grand Prix, rivals for the title Maximo and Angel battle it out on the track while Eddie comes to terms with a potentially career-ending injury.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League: Stories of the Finals
programme.desc: A look back at the 1993 UEFA Champions League final between Marseille and AC Milan in Munich. Marseille were looking to become the first French side to lift the European title.

programme.title: Ultimate Pool Pairs Cup
programme.desc: Ultimate Pool action from Group 5 of the Pairs Cup, featuring Chris Day and Carl Morris, Jez Graham and Jordan Graham, and Simon Fitzsimmons and Dave Hunt.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Brentford face Arsenal at Gtech Community Stadium. Brentford have lost just one of their last 10 home league games.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Newcastle United face Manchester United at St James' Park. Man United are winless in their last three league games against Newcastle.

programme.title: What I Wore
programme.desc: Former Chelsea star Mikel John Obi describes his passion for football via the shirts which have defined his life.

programme.title: TNT Sports Cricket Reload
programme.desc: A look back at the best bowling action from the first Test between Sri Lanka and Bangladesh in Galle, including a five-wicket haul by spinner Nayeem Hasan.

programme.title: Live: One-Day International Cricket
programme.desc: Cricket action from the second One Day International between Sri Lanka and Bangladesh at R Premadasa International Stadium.

programme.title: Discovery Golf
programme.desc: We preview the John Deere Classic and get some tips from Davis Thompson, who defends his title against the likes of Rickie Fowler, Max Homa and Tom Kim.

programme.title: Live: Global Champions Tour
programme.desc: Coverage of the Longines Global Champions Tour and the 2025 Grand Prix of Monaco, as the best riders in the world compete in a breathtaking waterfront setting.

programme.title: MotoGP Rewind
programme.desc: A look back at the best action from the 2025 Grand Prix of Netherlands at the iconic TT Circuit Assen, as title-chasing Marc Marquez looked for a 68th MotoGP victory.

programme.title: Wimbledon 2025
programme.desc: Action from Wimbledon, the third of the four tennis Grand Slams each year.

programme.title: TNT Sports Reload
programme.desc: The best bits from TNT Sports over the last week, including exclusive interviews, the best action and so much more.

programme.title: Tour de France Cycling
programme.desc: Highlights from the opening stage of the 2025 Tour de France, as the riders set off on a 184km route around Lille Metropole.

programme.title: UFC Connected
programme.desc: UFC Connected brings fans a unique look inside the UFC with exclusive access to fighters, teams and events from around the globe.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded
programme.desc: Relive the women's featherweight bout between Cris Cyborg and Yana Kunitskaya at UFC 222.

programme.title: Fight Week
programme.desc: Adam Catterall, Nick Peet, and Michael Bisping react to UFC 317, which brought fireworks to the Octagon, with Ilia Topuria making a massive statement against Charles Oliveira.

programme.title: TNT Sports Reload
programme.desc: The best bits from TNT Sports over the last week, including exclusive interviews, the best action and so much more.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action as Thiago Motta's undefeated Juventus face bottom side Venezia at Allianz Stadium. Juve have drawn nine of their opening 15 league games of the season.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: AC Milan look to bounce back from their defeat against Atalanta as they welcome Genoa to San Siro. Patrick Vieira's visiting side are unbeaten in their last five Serie A matches.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Action from Serie A as Monza face Juventus at U-Power Stadium. Thiago Motta's Juve side are still unbeaten in the league, but have drawn 10 of their 16 matches.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Action from Serie A as Simone Inzaghi's free-scoring Inter face-off against Como at San Siro. Cesc Fabregas' Como are unbeaten in their last three league games.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Action from Serie A as Davide Nicola's Cagliari and Simone Inzaghi's Inter face-off at Unipol Domus. Cagliari held Inter to a 2-2 draw when these sides met in April.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Action from Serie A as Paulo Fonseca's AC Milan host Claudio Ranieri's Roma at San Siro. Milan are unbeaten in each of their last nine league matches against Roma.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Action from Serie A as Fiorentina face Antonio Conte's Napoli at Stadio Artemio Franchi. Fiorentina have not won at home against Napoli in the league since 2018.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action from Derby della Capitale as Claudio Ranieri's Roma meet rivals Lazio at Stadio Olimpico. Roma were 1-0 winners when these sides last met in April.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Fresh off their thrilling Supercoppa Italiana triumph, Sergio Conceicao's AC Milan host Cagliari at San Siro. Milan are unbeaten in their last 13 games against Cagliari in Serie A.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Action from Serie A as Napoli meet Verona.

programme.title: One-Day International Cricket
programme.desc: Sri Lanka seek to continue their impressive white ball home form as they face Bangladesh in the first of three ODIs at R Premadasa International Stadium in Colombo.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
